description: Master the classic beef stroganoff, no slow cooker needed. Your family will love this creamy recipe that's perfect for a hearty weeknight dinner.
keywords: Stroganoff,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,High protein,Soy free,Leftovers,Peanut free
name: Beef Stroganoff Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat and cook beef in batches for 3 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a bowl.

Increase heat to medium-high and add onion and mushrooms to pan. Cook for 10 minutes or until golden and liquid has evaporated. Sprinkle flour over mushroom mixture. Add tomato paste and mustard. Stir and cook for 1 minute.

Slowly add beef stock and sauce to pan, stirring constantly. Bring mixture to the boil. Return beef to pan with sour cream. Stir until combined. Cook for 2 minutes or until meat is heated through. Sprinkle with parsley, to serve.
